section.title: Running the bundle
section.para:
Now compile and run this module (bundle) over the apache felix web console. This console is a simple tool for inspecting and managing OSGI framework instances on the users designated web browser. The application is run over this (hyperlink) link.
Creating a Maven project - step 1
Here simply click Install/Update, which will result with the following screen
Creating a Maven project - step 1
To correctly configure these fields, follow these steps:
Start bundle (to run the bundle) Refresh Packages (to refresh the package list) Choose file (here we select the afore-compiled jar file)
and click the Install or Update button, which will result with this screen (we can notice that the panifex-samples-salute.spi is neatly installed and active)
Creating a Maven project - step 1
If all has been installed properly, when the application is refreshed a menu will appear, and after clicking on it, the defined context.
Creating a Maven project - step 1
The Salutation combobox is here still empty due to the reason that not a single salutation-service implementation has been defined.
